results.title: Pediatric and Adult Rare Tumor Network - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The network of scientists, healthcare providers, advocates, patients, and family members, is working on solid rare tumors that have no cures.

results.title: Primitive Neuro-Ectodermal Tumors (PNET) - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Learn about primitive neuro-ectodermal tumor (PNET) grades, features, causes, symptoms, who the tumors affect, how and where they form, and treatments.

results.title: Advancing Treatments for Pineal Region Tumors - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Read how collaborating across specialties can help neuro-oncologists better understand pineal region tumors.

results.title: Brain and Spine Tumor Anatomy and Functions - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Learn about your tumor location in the brain or spine to understand your symptoms and what changes you may experience.

results.title: Atypical Teratoid Rhabdoid Tumors (ATRT) - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Learn about atypical teratoid rhabdoid tumor (ATRT) grades, features, causes, symptoms, who the tumors affect, how and where they form, and treatments.

results.title: In Treatment for a Rare Brain or Spine Tumor - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Patients with a rare brain or spine tumor can learn about treatments, clinical trials, finding an expert doctor, and get guiding, support, and coping information.

results.title: Rare Brain and Spine Tumor Stories - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Get advice, tips, support, and inspiration from patients and caregivers living with a rare CNS tumor.

results.title: Rare Brain and Spine Tumor Meeting - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Read a summary of the 2019 NCI-CONNECT and BTTC meetings to learn about the latest brain and spine tumor advances and clinical trials.

results.title: Rare Brain & Spine Tumor Network - National Cancer Institute
results.description: NCI-CONNECT Rare Brain and Spine Tumor Network connects patients, providers, and advocates to help people with rare brain and spine tumors get better care.

results.title: Living with a Rare Brain or Spine Tumor - National Cancer Institute
results.description: View questions to ask your health care team, ways to manage your self-care, treatment and support resources, and hear from patients and caregivers living with rare brain and spine tumors to guide you through your journey.

results.title: Advice from the Brain Tumor Community - National Cancer Institute
results.description: To help guide you through your brain tumor journey, patients, caregivers, doctors, and advocates share their advice.

results.title: Clinical Trials to Treat Pituitary Tumors - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Find clinical trials to treat pituitary tumors.

results.title: Tumor DNA Sequencing in Cancer Treatment - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Tumor DNA sequencing (also called genetic profiling or genetic testing) is a test to identify DNA changes in a patientâ€™s cancer. In some cases, this information can help determine a treatment plan.

results.title: Drug Shrinks Pediatric Neural Tumor - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The drug selumetinib shrunk neural tumors in children with plexiform neurofibromas.

results.title: Immune Cells in Blood Recognize Tumors - National Cancer Institute
results.description: NCI scientists have developed a novel strategy for identifying immune cells circulating in the blood that recognize specific proteins on tumor cells, a finding they believe may have potential implications for immune-based therapies.

results.title: Engineering Personalized Micro-Tumor Ecosystems - National Cancer Institute
results.description: This study seeks to develop a micronized tumor ecosystem which can be used to choose the most effective cancer therapy for a patient before initiation of treatment.

results.title: Clinical Trials to Treat Brain Tumors - National Cancer Institute
results.description: A list of open treatment clinical trials for adult and childhood brain tumors.

results.title: Toxin Targets Tumor Blood Vessels - National Cancer Institute
results.description: An NCI Cancer Currents blog on a study which shows that an anthrax toxin-based cancer therapy may attack tumors by selectively targeting blood vessels that feed them.

results.title: Pancreatic Organoids Mimic Patient Tumors - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Pancreatic organoids can be established quickly, cheaply, and reliably. They mimic patient histopathology and can be frozen and revived for large studies.

results.title: Selumetinib Shrinks Tumors in Children with NF1 - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The investigational drug selumetinib shrank tumors in some children with a genetic syndrome called neurofibromatosis type 1 (NF1). As this Cancer Currents post explains, the drug also improved symptoms related to tumors known as neurofibromas, which can cause pain, difficulty breathing or walking, and disfigurement.
